# DeviceActivityReportExtension

**Protocol**

An app extension that reports device activity data.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol DeviceActivityReportExtension : AppExtension
```

## Overview

Your extension is provided with the data that your app requests when it instantiates a `DeviceActivityReport`, which it uses to render a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SwiftUI/View] representing the user’s device activity.

## Associated Types

- **Body**: The body of the extension’s scene.

## Instance Properties

- **body**: A body containing a [doc://com.apple.DeviceActivity/documentation/DeviceActivity/DeviceActivityReportScene] for each context that your extension supports.

## Inherits From

- AppExtension
